testsuite.name: users.UsersLastNameFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Last Name field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Last Name text is displayed in the Last Name placeholder TC_usersLastNamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Last Name field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Last Name field Entered text "hMEMolmIPrVyjSwbnWewrhZkHNDUwfu" in the Users screen Last Name field Must not exceed 30 characters error message is displayed TC_usersLastNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Last Name field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Last Name field Entered text "f" in the Users screen Last Name field The Last Name field is not a mandatory field and there is no minimum character limit TC_usersLastNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Last Name field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen Last Name field Entered text "$;{!" in the Users screen Last Name field Special characters are allowed in the Last Name text field TC_usersLastNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Last Name field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen Last Name field Entered text "sdMQ" in the Users screen Last Name field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the Last Name text field TC_usersLastNameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Last Name in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Last Name field Entered text "" in the Users screen Last Name field The Last Name field is not a mandatory field and a error message is not displayed if no data is entered TC_usersLastNameEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLastNameSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Last Name field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Last Name text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersLastNameSpace Testcase execution Completed
